newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Alex. Brown cuts American Eagle.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Alex. Brown cuts American Eagle.

text.p: -- Alex Brown said Tuesday it had cut its rating on American Eagle Outfitters Inc to neutral from buy.
-- Additional details were not immediately available.
-- After the market closed Monday, American Eagle said December same-store sales fell 16.9 percent and that, as a result, it expects fourth quarter earnings to fall below analysts' expectations.

-- American Eagle said the drop in sales was due to fewer shopping days in 1996, a lower than expected performance in women's apparel, and tough comparisons against last year's 11.3 percent same-store sales rise.
